title: 61. Paul Ezra Rhoades – The Grocery Store Killer
description:
On this episode of MWMH, Payton and Garrett discuss serial killer, Paul Ezra Rhoades.

Case Sources:
http://www.fdsidaho.org/clemency/rhoades/full_story.html
https://odp.idaho.gov/wp-content/uploads/sites/114/2019/12/Methamphetamine-2018_Update.pdf
